entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Oakville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:31 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burlington Lift Bridge 1:00 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
Temperature: 1.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 84 %
Dewpoint: -1.2°C
Wind: NE 36 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow at times heavy mixed with rain beginning late this afternoon. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 70. High plus 2. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High 6.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light in the morning. High 6. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023
